definition: A feeling of emotional pain or sorrow experienced when parting from someone or something significant, often used to describe the bittersweet sentiment associated with saying goodbye to a loved one, a cherished place, or a meaningful period of time.

examples.english: The pain of parting was unbearable.

examples.german: Sie konnte den Abschiedsschmerz nicht ertragen.
examples.english: She couldn't bear the pain of parting.

examples.german: Der Abschiedsschmerz wird mit der Zeit verblassen.
examples.english: The pain of parting will fade with time.

examples.german: Er verspürte einen starken Abschiedsschmerz, als er seine Heimat verließ.
examples.english: He felt a strong pain of parting when he left his homeland.
The pain of parting was overwhelming.
